entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 near midnight. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 late in the evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
